body_html:
Probably an issue with the configuration script again.

GetCudnnVersion needs to return 4, see:
https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/stream_executor/dso_loader.cc#L57

tensorflow/configure

Line 243 in 14ac223

perl -pi -e "s,(GetCudnnVersion.*return )\"[0-9\.]*\",\1\"$TF_CUDNN_VERSION\",s" tensorflow/stream_executor/dso_loader.cc

And you might want to hardcode "1" for the CUDA library too
https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/stream_executor/dso_loader.cc#L75

body:
Probably an issue with the configuration script again.

`GetCudnnVersion` needs to return `4`, see:
https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/stream_executor/dso_loader.cc#L57
https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/14ac2235699509f512b44b71160239c153ab413d/configure#L243

And you might want to hardcode `"1"` for the CUDA library too
https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/stream_executor/dso_loader.cc#L75
